resources.string: This is an app widget description

Due to limitations by application developers, the location search feature can only be searched using provincial keywords with lower front letters. Here is a list of location search keywords in this application 
1. Aceh = aceh 
2. Bali = bali 
3. Bangka Belitung = babel 
4. Banten = banten 
5. Benkulu = bengkulu 
6. Yogyakarta = jogyakarta 
7. Jakarta = jakarta 
8. Gorontalo = gorontalo 
9. Jambi = jambi 
10. Jawa Barat = jawabarat 
11. Jawa Tengah = jawatengah 
12. Jawa Timur = jawatimur 
13. Kalimantan Barat = kalbar 
14. Kalimantan Selatan = kalsel 
15. Kalimantan Tengah = kalteng 
16. Kalimantan Timur = kaltim 
17. Kalimantan Utara = kaluta 
18. Kepulauan Riau = kepriau 
19. Lampung = lampung 
20. Maluku = maluku 
21. Maluku Utara = malut 
22. Nusa Tenggara Barat = ntb 
23. Nusa Tenggara Timur = ntt 
24. Papua = papua 
25. Papua Barat = papuabarat 
26. Riau = riau 
27. Sulawesi Barat = sulbar 
28. Sulawesi Selatan = sulsel 
29. Sulawesi Tengah = sulteng 
30. Sulawesi Tenggara = sultenggara 
31. Sulawesi Utara = sulut 
32. Sumatera Barat = sumbar 
33. Sumatera Selatan = sumsel 
34. Sumatera Utara = sumut
